channel.title: ProjectDivine
channel.description:
[center][size=10pt][i][b]Project Divine[/b][/i][/size][/center] [center]Hello guys and girls i am currently programing a new server what i am looking for. I am looking for someone who can program 'PI' a few beta testers and a gfx master. I am currently waitting for my domain and webserver.[/center] [center][size=12pt][i][b]Goals[/b][/i][/size][/center] [center]Well some of are goals are to have a great and loving server where people come to blow off steam relax chill talk to there friends.As lead programer i will be looking to make this server something that you will never forget. ProjectDivine will only have features that the player want we will no be like runescape and add dumb pointless updates will be highly active and will not forget why we made this game for the players to enjoy there are many things players can do and more will be coming.[/center] Updates Done New donator options. New Home Lottery system -note- will need some work in some places Media [IMG]http://i107.photobucket.com/albums/m302/burton511/pic3.png[/img] Apply in this format
Name: Gender: Age: Years Of Experience: Previous Work:Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be
Spots open server programer/Me/1/2 beta tester-0/5 Web Developer Me/1/2 More info pics coming soon Thanks Mopar

item.title: ProjectDivine
item.dc:creator: @Creede Creede
item.description:
@Creede wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:5, topic:409822”][quote author=Creede link=topic=511095.msg3709880#msg3709880 date=1313280123]
i can beta and do gfx

and if ya need a forums i can do mybb.
[/quote]Hollywood Undead <3

It look really good, although I don’t like the white shit around him, it makes it look weird. And his arm that you can visibly see looks really smudged on the bottom, not really a problem cause that was something I noticed like really after I looked at it… But other than that white stuff, I love it.

HU Forever <3[/quote]

ye the render’s fingers where choppy so i had to smudge it more than id like to and the whitness is bright light effect
one side of him is daark the other is light they play off each other

[center][size=10pt]Project Divine[/size][/center]
[center]Hello guys and girls i am currently programing a new server what i am looking for.
I am looking for someone who can program ‘PI’ a few beta testers and a gfx master.
I am currently waitting for my domain and webserver.[/center]
[center][size=12pt]Goals[/size][/center]
[center]Well some of are goals are to have a great and loving server where people come to blow off steam relax chill talk to there friends.As lead programer i will be looking to make this server something that you will never forget.
ProjectDivine will only have features that the player want we will no be like runescape and add dumb pointless updates will be highly active and will not forget why we made this game for the players to enjoy there are many things players can do and more will be coming.[/center]
Updates Done
New donator options.
New Home
Lottery system -note- will need some work in some places
Media

Apply in this format

Name: Gender: Age: Years Of Experience: Previous Work:Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be

beta tester-0/5
